Uses of Package
org.drasyl.peer.connection

  • Packages that use org.drasyl.peer.connection 
    Package Description
    org.drasyl
    Core API that includes the DrasylNode and DrasylConfig.
    org.drasyl.messenger
    Decides which path/peer is used to send outgoing messages.
    org.drasyl.peer.connection.client
    Connects to super peer and other peers.
    org.drasyl.peer.connection.direct
    Establishes direct connections to other peers.
    org.drasyl.peer.connection.server
    Provides a server to which children and other peers can connect.
  • Classes in org.drasyl.peer.connection used by org.drasyl 
    Class Description
    PeerChannelGroup
    Special type of ChannelGroup, which has a lookup complexity of O(1) instead of O(n) for lookups by CompressedPublicKey.
  • Classes in org.drasyl.peer.connection used by org.drasyl.messenger 
    Class Description
    PeerChannelGroup
    Special type of ChannelGroup, which has a lookup complexity of O(1) instead of O(n) for lookups by CompressedPublicKey.
  • Classes in org.drasyl.peer.connection used by org.drasyl.peer.connection.client 
    Class Description
    DefaultSessionInitializer
    Creates a newly configured ChannelPipeline for a new channel for a connection to or from a the Server.
    PeerChannelGroup
    Special type of ChannelGroup, which has a lookup complexity of O(1) instead of O(n) for lookups by CompressedPublicKey.
  • Classes in org.drasyl.peer.connection used by org.drasyl.peer.connection.direct 
    Class Description
    PeerChannelGroup
    Special type of ChannelGroup, which has a lookup complexity of O(1) instead of O(n) for lookups by CompressedPublicKey.
  • Classes in org.drasyl.peer.connection used by org.drasyl.peer.connection.server 
    Class Description
    DefaultSessionInitializer
    Creates a newly configured ChannelPipeline for a new channel for a connection to or from a the Server.
    PeerChannelGroup
    Special type of ChannelGroup, which has a lookup complexity of O(1) instead of O(n) for lookups by CompressedPublicKey.
